alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued August 19 at 1:48AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: .Significant flow expected in the Whitewater River and the Coachella Storm Water Channel by Sunday night. Rain is forecast to develop over the San Bernardino Mountains and northern portions of the Coachella Valley today, and become heavy on Sunday. Rainfall of 6 to 12 inches will be possible over the mountains by Monday morning...with several inches possible at lower elevations. As the soils become saturated and runoff accelerates, significant flows will develop in the Whitewater River. These flows are forecast to reach Palm Springs Sunday night...and flow southward through the Coachella Valley to Indio and beyond through Monday. The flow will impact low-water crossings and may create dangerous swift-water areas through the valley. Residents should be prepared for road closures and listen for later advisories.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
